DOC.brief_summary: This observational study intend collect efficacy safety data ROCC Knee system .
DOC.detailed_description: The ROCC® prosthesis rotate platform : - Highly congruent surface contact , - NON CONSTRAINED kinematics allow posterior roll back 110° anterior hyperflexion like normal knee - Allowing asymmetric movement
DOC.criteria: Patients suitable Knee Replacement : osteoarthritis , rheumatoid arthritis bone necrosis affect two knee compartment , correction genu varus , genu valgus posttraumatic deformity , sequelae prior procedure .
